title: A Look at Previous U.S. Vetoes of Gaza Cease-Fire Resolutions in the U.N.
description: Before a U.S. resolution in the United Nations Security Council calling for a cease-fire in Gaza was vetoed on Friday, the U.S. had vetoed three previous ones demanding a halt to the fighting.
content: Linda Thomas-Greenfield, the U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, voted against a resolution calling for an immediate cease-fire last month.
